Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of on-time deliveries to customers.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: (Number of On-Time Deliveries to Customers / Total Number of Customer Deliveries) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of order fulfillment against order specifications.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Orders Fulfilled / Total Number of Orders Fulfilled) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures the cost of outbound transportation per unit of product.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: Total Outbound Transportation Costs / Total Number of Units Shipped

Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of deliveries that meet the agreed-upon lead times to customers.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: (Number of Orders Delivered on Time / Total Number of Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of orders returned by customers.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: (Number of Orders Returned / Total Number of Orders) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures how satisfied customers are with the delivery process.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Delivery Process

Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of order picking.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Orders Picked / Total Number of Orders Picked) * 100

Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of optimizing transportation modes.
Supply Chain+Logistics+Outbound Logistic.FORMULA: (Number of Optimized Transportation Modes / Total Number of Transportation Modes Used) * 100
